web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: AlertDialogDescription now uses useAlertDialogContext() to get descriptionId and applies it as the id attribute. This connects to aria-describedby in AlertDialogContent. Both AlertDialogTitle and AlertDialogDescription follow the same pattern for ARIA accessibility.

web/src/components/tailadmin/ui/modal/in.description: Modal component now has role='dialog', aria-modal='true', and supports aria-labelledby/aria-describedby props. Close button has aria-label='Close modal'. TypeScript interface extended to include ARIA props.

web/src/hooks/useFocusTrap.ts.description: New useFocusTrap hook implements focus trapping for modal components. Accepts containerRef and isActive boolean. Exports FOCUSABLE_SELECTOR constant. Stores previously focused element, traps Tab/Shift+Tab, and returns focus on cleanup.
